channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Freeman hits 1st walk-off slam in World Series history as Dodgers top Yankees 6-3 in classic opener
item.description: Freddie Freeman hit the first game-ending grand slam in World Series history with two outs in the 10th inning, giving the Los Angeles Dodgers a 6-3 victory over the New York Yankees in a dramatic opener Friday night.

item.title: Havasupai Tribe set to receive federal aid for severe flood damage
item.description: The Havasupai Tribe is set to receive federal emergency aid to repair damage caused by severe flooding this summer.

item.title: Native Americans laud Biden for historic apology over boarding schools. They want action to follow
item.description: President Joe Biden has done something that no other sitting U.S. president has: He apologized for the systemic abuse generations of Indigenous children endured at the hands of the federal government.
